EmailTemplate.name: CAPA Task:Approval request
EmailTemplate.subject: Approval Request for {!01I61000000v12Z.RecordType}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
You have been assigned as an approver for the {!01I61000000v12Z.RecordType} task of CAPA record {!01I61000000udkO.Name}. Please log in to the application and complete the approval process by the due date identified.
Please contact {!01I61000000udkO.OwnerFullName} if you have any questions about this assignment and/or non-conformance record.
Thank you.
Click here for details{!01I61000000udkO.RecordType}
